entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Blowing snow. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
